product.longDescription: Blue, mauve, pink, purple, and white blooms clothed in a lacy netting of greenery. Heirloom favorite for fresh or dried flowers. Balloon-shaped seed pods. Also known as devil in a bush. Ht. 12–24". Avg. 14,000 seeds/oz. Packet: 50 seeds.
